lines: dev ko gujare ek maah ho chala tha
veena ek dam khaalee ho gaee thee
koee kaam nahee tha usake paas
sabhee kee koshish rahatee thee ki koee na koee usake paas bana rahe
pahale kuchh din to pramod va komal donon dopahar baad aa jaate the aur raat der tak vaheen ruke rahate the unake upasthiti mein veena ko achchha lagata tha
lekin maan krashna ko unaka yoon roj chala aana akharane laga tha
kyonki pramod kee upasthiti unhen dev kee baaten hee yaad karaatee thee
vah har baat ko lekar beechabeech mein ek baat hee kahatee pramod se tumhen dekhatee hoon to dev yaad ho aata hai
usaka duhkh chaahakar bhee kam nahee kar paate
dev yaad sabhee ko aata tha
lekin yaad ko baarabaar kuredana achchha nahee lagata doosaron ko
dheeredheere pramodakomal ka aana kam hone laga
amit veena ko dekhata to sochata ki yahee sthiti banee rahee to veena vakt gujarane ke saatasaat bilkul nishkriy ho jaegee
aise mein vah dev ke saathee prophesar tripaathee se milane chala gaya
prophesar tripaathee dev ke saath hee khaalasa kaalej mein padhaate the
unaka achchha dabadaba bhee tha kaalej mein
dopahar jab vah kaalej mein pahuncha us samay vah staapharum mein baithe apane doosare saathiyon ke saath baatacheet mein magn the
amit ko dekhate hee badee garmajoshee se uthakar usase mile
aao amit main subah hee tumhen yaad kar raha tha
apane paas bithaate hue bole kaho kaise chal raha hai
sab theek hai tripaathee saahab
kaee dinon se aapase milane kee soch raha tha aur aaj aapase milane chala aaya
amit ne kaha
achchha kiya main svayan tumase milakar veena jee kee saitalamaint ke vishay mein baat karana chaah raha tha
amit ke man kee baat ko jaise unhone bhaanp liya ho
svayan hee unhonne baat chhed dee
isee beech amit ko dekhakar any kaee lekcharaar jo use dev ke sandarbh mein jaanate the chale aae
sabakee baatacheet ka kendr veena hee ban gaee thee
kya socha hai veena jee ne apane lie prashn prophesar jasapaal sinh ka tha
abhee to vah sambhalee bhee nahin hain apane duhkh se
lekin main chaahata hoon kaalej kee taraph se yadi koee aashvaasan mil jaata dev kee post ke evaj mein
kaalej unhen yadi lekcharaar ke rup mein niyukt kar de to bahut achchha hoga unake lie
amit ne apanee baat kahee sabase
kyon nahin kyon nahin
ek saath teenachaar sammilit svar ubhare
veena jee emesasee hai na ek ne poochha
jee haan shaadee se pahale to vah kendriy vidyaalay mein padhaatee thee
dev kee beemaaree ke dauraan koshish kee traansaphar kee aur jab traansaphar nahee huee to unhonne tyaagapatr de diya
bahutabadee galatee kar dee unhonne
itanee achchhee naukaree nahee chhodanee chaahie thee
bina tanakhvaah ke chhuttee le letee
prophesar tripaathee ne kaha
tab socha tha dev theek ho jaega to dubaara se koshish kar legee aur phir unhonne socha tha dev ke theek hone ke baad vah peeechadee karengee aur tab kaalej kee naukaree hee behatar rahegee unake lie
amit ne saphaee dee
khair ab jo ho gaya usako sochane ka koee phaayada nahee
ab to prinsipal saahab ko mil kar kahana chaahie kuchh karane ko
yah sujhaav prophesar mattoo ka tha jise dev kee salaah par hee naukaree ke lie chuna gaya tha

tab prophesar tripaathee ne amit se kaha amit aise mein behatar hoga tum kal hee veena jee kee taraph se ek praarthanaapatr banaakar le aao behatar rahega unhen saath lekar hee prinsipal saahab se mil lo
ham bhee aaj ya kal unase milakar baat kar lenge
aur aage kee yojana usake baad hee banaen to theek rahega
jaisa aap behatar samajhen
main kal hee unhen lekar aa jaunga
amit ne kaha aur uthane ka upakram karate hue bola achchha chalata hoon
kal miloonga
aur sabase haath milaakar vah baahar nikal aaya
tab usake saathasaath prophesar mattoo bhee baahar aa gae amit dev ke provident phand ke lie bhee phaarm bhaarana hoga aur haan kal main teechars velapheyar phand ka bhee phaarm mangava loonga
usake antargat kisee bhee teechar kee aakasmik mratyu par rupaye dene ka praavadhaan hai
yah sunakar amit ne kaha mattoo bhaee
aaj hamen rupayepaise kee jarurat nahin jarurat hai bhaabhee ko sahaara den kee unake khaleepan ko door karane kee
unake lie koee raasta ban jae bas yahee kaamana keejie
main tumhaare saath hoon amit mujhase aur any sabhee se jo ban padega vah ham karenge
tab prophesar mattoo se haath milaakar amit ne vida lee
agale din veena ko saath lekar amit kaalej pahunch gaya
prinsipal saahab bahut achchhee tarah mile
unake vyavahaar se laga ki jaise prophesar tripaathee ne unase is sambandh mein pahale se hee baat kar lee thee
veena kee arjee ko dekhane ke baad vah bole dekhie veena jee main apanee taraph se pooree koshish karunga ki aapako teeching laeen mein hee koee aaphar dee ja sake
lekin meree apanee raay mein behatar hoga ki aap teeching kee apeksha edaministreshan kee jaab hee len
aisa kyon sar veena unhen dekhate hue bolee
aap svayan dekhie
lagabhag gyaarah varsh pahale apane kaalej kee padhaee pooree kee thee
usake baad aapane praimaree teechar kee naukaree kee
ab dhaee saal se bilkul kuchh nahin kar rahee hain
ek tarah se apane vishay se aap lambe samay se bilkul bhee tach mein nahin hain aise mein kaalej star kee padhaee karavaana bilkul sambhav nahin hoga
unhonne apanee raay spasht kar dee
main mehanat se apane vishay ko phir se grahan kar loongee
phir kuchh rukee aur bolee lekin phir bhee aap jo uchit samajhen vah keejie
amit ko tab laga antim vaaky bhaabhee ko nahin kahana chaahie tha
ve donon tab unase vida lekar baahar nikale
staapharum mein pahunch kar jab amit ne saaree baat prophesar tripaathee se kahee to unhonne bhee kaha bhaabhee jee aapake antim vaaky se sab gadabad ho gaee
ab vah yahee kahenge ki aapako koee klairikal jaab de dee jae
vah to main karungee nahee tab veena ne kaha
vah to aapako unheen se kahana hoga
tab prophesar tripaathee ne kaha
chalie unhen koee prapojal to dene deejie
tabhee baat kee jaegee
tab amit ne kaha
amit tumhaaree baat theek hai lekin aajakal jamaana doosare kee raay apane upar laadane ka nahin hai
aaj to avasar milate hee achchhee naukaree haasil karane ke lie sabhee neetiyaan apanaanee padatee hai
laikcharaaraship ke lie jo nyoonatam yogyata honee jaruree hai vah to hai phir kaahe ka dar
ek baar naukaree mil jae phir sab theek ho jaata hai
phir dheere se phusaphusaate hue bole ye log bhool rahe hai
prophesar jasapaal kee patnee ko dev ne hee niyukt karavaaya tha
chaahe raajaneetik davaab ke kaaran unakee patnee ko naukaree milee thee
lekin dekho donon patipatnee ek hee kaalej mein laikcharaar hai
donon kee hee eme saikind diveejan
amit ko laga prophesar tripaathee sahaanubhooti prakat kar aisee baate kar apane ko unaka sabase bada himaayatee saabit karana chaahate hai
bhaabhee ke paristhiti doosaree hai tripaathee saahab unhen aaj hausala dekar kaha jaana chaahie ki aap yah karen ham aapake saath hai
amit ne kaha
yahee to mai kah raha hoon
ham sab inake saath hai
ab aap prinsipal saahab se phir milana aur laikcharaaraship ke lie hee jor dena
tripaathee saahab ke shabdon se veena ka saahas phir badh gaya tha
ghar pahunch kar inhonne dekha ki pannaalaal va nirmala aae hue the
veena apanee maan ko dekhakar usase lipat gaee aur barabas usakee aankhen bahane lagee
unake aane ka prayojan amit ko apanee maan se gyaat hua
ve veena ko apane saath le jaane ke lie aae the
krashna ka man bhee khinn tha
pita shreeraam apanee aadat ke anusaar chup the
amit ne hee baat chalaee abhee kuchh din ruk jaen bhaabhee to behatar hoga
shaayad naukaree kee kuchh baat ban jae
beta koee sada ke lie to nahee le ja rahe use ham
maan nirmala ne kaha thode badalaav se isaka man bhee theek ho jaega aur thoda hamen bhee achchha lagega
ghar mein har samay isee mein dhyaan laga rahata hai
tab krashna ne kaha hamaara bhee ab kaun hai veena to meree apanee betee hai
dev nahee raha ab isee ko dekhakar yahee lagata hai hamaara doosara dev yahee hai
aapakee hee betee hai bahan jee main aapase nivedan karata hoon ki aap bhee chalie kuchh din hamaare paas rah aaie
aapako bhee achchha lagega
yah pannaalaal ne kaha tha krashna se
tab pita shreeraam ne apanee chuppee todee veena ka man hai to le jaie beshak usakee khushee mein hee hamaaree khushee hai
veena ko deharaadoon jaane kee sochakar hee achchha lag raha tha
ekaek use laga ki kaheen kuchh khaaleepan hai yahaan
yahaan se door hatakar achchha lagega use
aise mein naukaree milane se behatar use lag raha tha kuchh aaraam
naukaree paane kee laalasa jo dopahar tak thee usake man mein usase upar uth aaee maan ke paas baithakar aaraam karane kee chaah
aise mein amit kuchh kahata to shaayad veena ko nirmala va pannaalaal ko anyatha lag sakata tha
usane chup rahana hee behatar samajha
agale din subahasavere vah un sabako bas par bitha kar laut aaya
chaahakar bhee amit maan nirmala se priya kee koee baat nahin kar paaya
chaahakar bhee veena bhaabhee ke haath priya ko koee patr na bhej saka
use uchit nahee lag raha tha aise mein priya kee koee baat bhee karana
haan veena ne bas par chadhatechadhate usase poochh liya tha kuchh kahana hai priya ko ekaek kuchh sujhaee nahee diya use bas yahee bol saka meree hailo kahana
amit kee dinacharya bilkul badal gaee thee
ekaek use laga vah kaam hote hue bhee bilkul khaalee ho gaya hain kahaan subah se shaam tak apane kaam ke baad use sirph ek hee chinta satae rahatee thee dev kee veena kee
aur dev ke baad do maheene sirph veena kee aur ab kuchh nahee subah uthata naashta karata apane kaam par chala jaata aur koshish rahatee usakee jyaada se jyaada der tak bana rahe
ghar lautakar use kuchh karana achchha nahee lagata tha
der raat ghar lautata nahaakar khaana khaata aur so jaata
sotesote need khulatee to priya ko yaad karane lagata
kabhee raat ek baje kabhee do baje to kabhee teen baje uthakar use patr likhata
veena ko gae pandrah din ho gae the aur is beech priya ke kaee patr aae usane bhee use lagabhag roj ek patr likha
bhaabhee ke lie usake paas vahee shabd the
bhaabhee ke bina ghar soona hai
khaaleekhaalee lagata hai
kab ghar mein khaana banata hai kab khatm ho jaata hai
soonepan ke atirikt kuchh nahee
aur priya bhee yahee kuchh likha karatee deedee ab bahut badal gaee hai
chup rahane ke siva kuchh nahee karatee
ek minat bhee akela chhodo to rone lagatee hai
dev kee yaad usaka peechha nahee chhodatee
ham bhee use akela nahee chhodate
aise mein amit deedee ko dillee bhejana uchit hai kya aur aise mein amit kuchh nahee likh paata
prophesar tripaathee bhee aae the is beech
unheen se maaloom pada kee prinsipal ne mainejing kametee se veena ke lie aaphis kee naukaree ke lie peshakash kee thee
veena kee anupasthiti mein kuchh nahin ho sakata tha
tab amit ne deharaadoon jaane ka nirnay kar liya
maanbaapoo jee ko is vishay mein usane sankshep mein soochit kar diya aur agale hee din subah chaar baje kaar uthaakar deharaadoon ke lie ravaana ho gaya
maan ne use keval itana hee kaha ek din se jyaada tum na rukana aur veena ko saath hee lekar aana
aur amit apanee dhun mein kaar chalata hua chaar ghante mein hee deharaadoon pahunch gaya
na kaar raaste mein rokee usane aur na hee speed kam huee
subahasavere sadak par yaataayaat shoony ke baraabar tha
amit ko aaya dekhakar sabhee ne usaka bahut garmajoshee se svaagat kiya
priya use ekatak dekhatee hee rah gaee
amit ne dekha khushee se usake gaal laal ho gae the
shabd na juta paee kuchh ekaek use saamane dekhakar
bas khusheekhushee bhaagakar usake lie chaay bana laee
amit ka aana veena bhaabhee ko bhee achchha laga
chaay peetepeete amit ne veena se kaha prinsipal ne aapake lie klerikal post ke lie hee manjooree dee hai
aur vah mujhe nahin karanee
veena ne do tuk utar diya
aisa to mainne bhee kaha hai prophesar tripaathee ko
lekin unakee raay hai ki aapake protest kie bina kuchh nahin ho sakata
dekho amit jahaan tak sirph naukaree kee baat hai uchit hai unakee yah aaphar
lekin jis kaalej mein dev prophesar tha vahaan usakee patnee ko ve log klark bana kar rakh chhoden yah dev ke naam ka apamaan hoga
haan mujhase kahate ek saal mehanat karo
bhaabhee abhee baat samaapt kahaan huee hai
abhee to samay hai
ham sab baaten unhen kah sakate hai
tab veena kuchh sochatee rahee phir bolee dekho amit sach kahoon to yahaan aakar mujhe laga ki mujhamen himmat nahee abhee kuchh karane kee
main abhee svayan ko bahut halka mahasoos kar rahee hoon
dev ke bina to kuchh achchha nahee lagata na yahaan na dillee mein dillee mein dev nahee ab dillee jaane ka man bhee nahee
veena chaahakar bhee apane aansuon ka pravaah na rok paee
dillee se naata tod logee bhaabhee itanee jaldee maanbaaboo jee bhee to hain
amit ka svar bharra aaya tha
sab hai amit lekin sabake beech main akelee pad gaee hoon
veena ke aansoo bahane lage main yahaan bhee akelee hoon
sabake lie ek hee baat hai ki veena ka ab kya hoga shaadee se pahale aisa nahee tha
yah veena ka ghar tha
ab to main yahaan bhee paraee hoon
aur veena rone lagee phootaphootakar
are veena betee aisa kyon kah rahee hai too too hamase bhee man hee man ruthee hai
sabase ruthee hai
kyon aisee dasha bana rakhee hai toone tab maan nirmala ne usake sir ko apanee baahon mein lekar sahalaate hue kaha
main kisee se nahin ruthee maan mera bhaagy mujhase rutha hai
dekho na bhaagy rutha hai tabhee to sabhee mere bhaagy ka rona rote hai
aise mein main kaise hansoo veena ke aansoo rukane ka naam nahee le rahe the
tab amit ne bharrae shabdo mein kaha bhaabhee mujhase koee bhool ho gaee ho ya kuchh galat kaha ho to maaph kar do
lekin roo nahin
nahee amit tum galat na samajho mujhe
meree jagah khade hokar socho
yadi mujhe shaantasukhee dekhana chaahate ho to bolo kya uchit hai mere lie main kuchh karana chaahatee hoon lekin bheekh ke katore mein kuchh lekar nahin
apanee yogyata ke bal par
aur usase upar main kuchh samay akele rahana chaahatee hoon aur iseelie socha hai na dillee rahoon na deharaadoon
masooree ke kisee skool ko jyain kar loon aur vaheen hostal mein rahoon
veena ne ekaek man kee baat kahee
sab saaph ho gaya
amit bhee vahee karana chaahata tha jo veena chaahatee thee
vah veena kee ichchha ko nahee badalana chaahata tha
yah to achchhee baat hain
aapako vahee karana chaahie jo aapako svayan achchha lage
aise mein aap do took shabdon mein kah detee mujhe dillee naukaree nahee karanee
bas tab amit bhee sambhal gaya
main kah sakatee thee lekin chup thee maanbaaboo jee kya sochenge beta chala gaya
ab bahoo bhee nahee aana chaahatee
na jaane kaise main tumhaare parivaar se itana bandh gaee hoon amit ki na tum logon se door jaate banata hai ab na nikat rahate
dev mein jo aakarshan tha usakee dor bahut majaboot hai amit
veena phir rone lagee
aise mein amit ne man kee baat kahee achchha hai bhaabhee man se jo karana chaaho vahee karo
maanbaaboo jee ko main sambhaal loonga
din bhar amit priya ke saath ghoomata raha aur shaam chaar baje dillee ke lie ravaana ho gaya
raat das baje ke kareeb vah dillee lauta
krashna va shreeraam jaise usee kee prateeksha mein baithe the
amit ko akela aae dekhakar unaka man udaas ho gaya
dheeredheere usane saaree baaten unhen samajha deen aur saath hee kaha ab achchha yahee rahega ki ham bhaabhee ko apane man kee karane den
use jo achchha lagata hai vahee hamen achchha lagana chaahie
tab krashna ne kaha lekin main biraadaree ko kya kahoongee sab log to yahee kahenge ki beta gaya to bahoo ko bhee maayake bhej diya
kahane ko bahut kuchh hai logon ke paas lekin jaruree nahin ki bekaar kee baaton ko tool diya jae
koee kuchh bhee kahe lekin hamaaree khushee bhaabhee kee khushee mein hai bas
amit ke shabdon ka arth jaanakar shreeraam ne hee kah diya krashna se amit theek kah raha hai
duniyaan kee hamen koee paravaah nahee
tab krashna kuchh aur na bol paee
use apanee udaasee apana duhkh pahale se adhik badha hua lag raha tha
masooree mein veena ko kaanvet aaph jeejas end meree mein naukaree mil gaee
sistar supreem ne use haan kahane mein jaraasa bhee samay nahin maanga
veena kee aap beetee aur usakee vartamaan dasha hee jaise usake lie sabase badee pahachaan ban gaee thee
veena ka vaheen doosaree adhyaapikaon ke saath rahane ka prabandh bhee ho gaya
kuchh hee dinon mein hostal ke niyamon mein veena bandh kar itanee vyast ho gaee ki agale ek maah mein keval ek din ke lie deharaadoon gaee
vaise bhee avakaash milana kathin tha sabhee ke lie
subah saat baje se lekar shaam aath baje tak koee na koee kaam rahata tha use
subahashaam bachchon ke saath hostal mein aur din mein kakshaon mein vyastata banee rahatee thee

lekin itanee vyastata ke baavajood raat der gae aksar usakee neend khul jaatee aur khidakee ke paas khadee hokar vah baahar door tak phaile andhiyaare mein banateebigadatee syaah parachhaeeyon ko hee der tak ghoora karatee
kabhee sisak padatee to usakee rumamet neera uth kar usako saantvana diya karatee
